::DeathScythe::

DeathScythe nods, looking at Zyber. Keeping his face in a friendly 
expression, he answers her. "Yes, I think I've been repaired."

He glances at the fire, looking back at her. "I wish to thank you for 
saving my life," he says. It was a lie, of course. He wasn't thankful 
at all. As soon as he got the neccessary information, he'd kill 
her, "But I think I have been out a long time. Do you have any 
information about this planet? Anything at all?"

He hated acting like a friendly bot, but he was good at acting. As 
long as he got to kill Zyber in the end, it was allright with him.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> * Zyber shifted but she wasn't asleep, her eyes pricked as she 
suddenly 
> heard footsteps.
> She opened one eye and found herseld looking at Blaster(DeathScyth) 
from 
> across the fire.
> 
> Zyber raised her head and shook herself a bit, her coat dry and 
rather 
> fluffy from the snow.
> She yawned a bit and then turned her attention towards Blaster, 
surprised 
> that he was well enough to walk now.
> She smiled*
> 
> " Better now are we? Hmm...that is good."
> 
> * Zyber moved to a sit and stratched her shoulders.*
> 
>
